greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Number of nonnegative solutions of x1^2 + x2^2 + ... + x7^2 = n.
link: Seiichi Manyama, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..10000 (terms 0..2000 from T. D. Noe)
Index entries for sequences related to sums of squares
formula: G.f.: (1 + theta_3(q))^7/128, where theta_3() is the Jacobi theta function. - _Ilya Gutkovskiy_, Aug 08 2018
mathematica: (1 + EllipticTheta[3, 0, q])^7/128 + O[q]^50 // CoefficientList[#, q]& (* _Jean-François Alcover_, Aug 26 2019 *)
program: (PARI) seq(n)=Vec((sum(k=0, sqrtint(n), x^(k^2)) + O(x*x^n))^7) \\ _Andrew Howroyd_, Aug 08 2018
results.author: _N. J. A. Sloane_
